keyword_with_params.title: keyword_with_params
keyword_with_params.description: Represents the keyword and its parameters to be detected as burst.

items.title: scaling_param
items.description: A scaling parameter applied for this keyword.

items.title: gamma
items.description: A Î³ value applied for this keyword. The higher value reduces the burst detection sensitivity.

batch.title: batch
batch.description: Represents the burst detection result for one batch range.

items.title: all_data_count
items.description: Number of total documents in this batch.

items.title: relevant_data_count
items.description: Number of documents that contains the keyword in this batch.

items.title: burst_weight
items.description: Burst level of this batch. Burst level is a relative value that cannot be compared between keywords.

document.title: document
document.description: Represents the document used for burst detection.

items.title: pos
items.description: Position (time in many cases) of this document.

items.title: text
items.description: Contents of this document. Keyword matching runs against this data using partial match.

add_documents.title: add_documents
add_documents.description: Register the document for burst detection. This This API is designed to accept bulk update with list of document. You need to register the keyword via add_keyword method before adding documents. A document whose location (pos) is out of range of the current window cannot be registered.

return.description: number of documents successfully registered (will be the length of data if all documents are registered successfully)

items.title: data
items.description: list of documents to be added

get_result.title: get_result
get_result.description: Returns the burst detection result of the current window for pre-registered keyword keyword.

items.title: keyword
items.description: keyword to get burst detection result

get_result_at.title: get_result_at
get_result_at.description: Returns the burst detection result at the specified position pos for pre-registered keyword keyword.

items.title: keyword
items.description: keyword to get burst detection result

get_all_bursted_results.title: get_all_bursted_results
get_all_bursted_results.description: Returns the burst detection result of the current window for all pre-registered keywords.

return.description: pairs of keyword and its burst detection result

get_all_bursted_results_at.title: get_all_bursted_results_at
get_all_bursted_results_at.description: Returns the burst detection result at the specified position pos for all pre-registered keywords.

return.description: pairs of keyword and its burst detection result

get_all_keywords.title: get_all_keywords
get_all_keywords.description: Returns the list of keywords registered for burst detection.

return.description: list of keyword and its parameters

add_keyword.title: add_keyword
add_keyword.description: Registers the keyword keyword for burst detection.

return.description: True if Jubatus succeed to add the keyword

items.title: keyword_with_params
items.description: keyword and parameters to be added

remove_keyword.title: remove_keyword
remove_keyword.description: Removes the keyword keyword from burst detection.

return.description: True if Jubatus succeed to delete the keyword

remove_all_keywords.title: remove_all_keywords
remove_all_keywords.description: Removes all the keywords from burst detection.

return.description: True if Jubatus succeed to delete keywords
